thesis.title: Copper/Gold at 50-Year Lows: Major Risk-On Signal
key_points: BTC cycle timing suggests early phase, not late
Dollar weakness adds fuel to risk-on trade

predicted_timeline.btc_cycle_peak_signal: Cu/Au peaks will precede by 12-60 days

historical_precedent.btc_2017: Cu/Au peak preceded BTC top by ~30 days
historical_precedent.btc_2021: Cu/Au peak preceded BTC top by ~12 days
